turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order three pizzas from the Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two small pizzas on veggie lover's and another one with onions and I want them thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did you want 3 or 2 pizzas total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, one veggie lovers and one with just onions?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $26, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Did you make them thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'll add that to your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be picking up, having it delivered or dining in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
